MicroMosaic Consulting & Collaboration Services

For Scientific work that resists performance and rewards integrity.

Download the consulting menu (PDF)

MicroMosaic is not a multi-vendor relay. It’s one scientist carrying an integrated practice so you don’t have to keep re-explaining the science. Choose a single pillar, mix them, or engage fractionally—the collaboration stays rigorous either way.

Data, Bioinformatics & Analysis

MicroMosaic approaches biological data as living context. Every analysis includes interpretation, collaboration with wet-lab partners, and figures ready for manuscripts, decks, or stakeholders.

Representative work

  • Whole genome, metagenomic, amplicon, and RNA-seq pipelines for bacteria and fungi
  • Comparative genomics, phylogenetics, and multi-omics synthesis
  • Experimental design guidance, metadata strategy, and QC planning
  • Visual and narrative reporting that makes decisions clear

Collaboration looks like discovery calls, scoped analyses, and iterative interpretation sessions. Pipelines can be handed off or run as a managed service depending on team capacity.

Science Communication & Translation

Communication is participatory, not performative. MicroMosaic turns complex results into narratives that maintain accuracy while inviting curiosity.

Representative work

  • Scientific writing for technical, mixed, and public audiences
  • Podcast and audio development, interviews, and sponsored storytelling
  • Editorial support for journals, manuscripts, SOPs, and grant narratives
  • Workshops on data literacy, interpretation, and collaborative sense-making
  • Event planning and production support for science-forward gatherings

Collaboration looks like co-developing outlines, scripts, or briefs with your SMEs, layering metaphor only when it clarifies, and providing research-backed storytelling assets.

Data Strategy, Governance & Leadership

Healthy data ecosystems need shared ownership. MicroMosaic builds the systems, governance, and literacy that keep science reproducible as you scale.

Representative work

  • Data governance working groups, literacy workshops, and executive alignment
  • LIMS/ELN selection, metadata strategy, and cost-aware cloud architecture
  • Responsible AI and analytics readiness conversations tailored to your workflows
  • Fractional data leadership for teams not ready to hire a full org

Collaboration looks like facilitated sessions, playbooks, and roadmaps that turn strategy into practice—always anchored in scientific integrity.

Engagement Models

  • Scoped Projects: Clearly defined analyses, reports, or communication assets.
  • Time-Bound Consulting: Sprint-style advisory support through transitions.
  • Fractional Partnerships: Embedded collaboration for ongoing oversight, interpretation, or leadership.

Selected work

Writing, audio, and workshops that reflect the same approach—rigor, clarity, and good judgment.

Browse selected work

Not sure where to start? Talk through your project and we can co-design the right level of support.
